author: Julia Boorstin
title: CBS plans all-stock bid for Viacom below market value, sources say
text:
CBS plans all-stock bid for Viacom below market value, sources say CBS will make a bid to buy Viacom. The bid would be below its market value. There was no word on the timing of the bid. Harriet Taylor | CNBC Les Moonves at 2015 Code Conference. 
CBS will make a bid to buy Viacom that's below its market value, sources close to the situation told CNBC. 
The all-stock bid would propose that CBS CEO Leslie Moonves would stay at the combined company for at least two years, sources said, confirming information earlier reported by Reuters. 
There was no word on the timing of the bid. Both CBS and Viacom declined to comment. 
â€” CNBC's Anita Balakrishnan contributed to this report. Julia Boorstin CNBC Senior Media & Entertainment Correspondent Related Securities
